nodes.description:
日本经济产业省（METI）是日本政府的关键部门之一，主要负责经济政策、工业政策、能源政策和国际经贸关系的制定和执行。METI致力于促进日本的经济增长和国际竞争力，同时确保消费者福利和能源安全。其策略还包括支持创新和技术发展，以及与其他国家的贸易和投资合作。

The Ministry of Economy, Trade and Industry (METI) is one of the pivotal arms of the Japanese government, principally overseeing the formulation and execution of economic policy, industrial policy, energy strategies, and international economic and trade relations. METI strives to foster economic growth and enhance Japan's global competitiveness while ensuring consumer welfare and energy security. Its strategies also encompass support for innovation and technological advancement and trade and investment collaboration with other nations.

nodes.description:
英国设计委员会成立于1944年，是一个独立的公益组织，致力于利用设计改进人们的生活。其宗旨是推广设计的价值和应用，以解决当今面临的复杂社会和经济问题。通过研究、教育和合作项目，该委员会与公共部门、企业和教育机构合作，提供设计策略和解决方案。

Established in 1944, the Design Council is an independent charity dedicated to improving lives through design. Its mission centers around championing the value and application of design to tackle the complex societal and economic challenges of today. Through research, education, and collaborative projects, the council partners with public sectors, businesses, and educational institutions to deliver design strategies and solutions.

nodes.description:
欧洲地区发展基金（ERDF）是欧洲联盟的一个关键组成部分，旨在强化经济和社会凝聚。ERDF通过资助项目来支持特定地区和城市的发展，减少成员国之间的不平衡。这些项目包括支持创新、研究、环境改善和提供基础设施。ERDF的资金也帮助吸引其他私人和公共部门的投资。

The European Regional Development Fund (ERDF) is a key component of the European Union, aimed at reinforcing economic and social cohesion. ERDF backs the development of specific regions and cities, diminishing imbalances among member states, by funding projects. These projects encompass support for innovation, research, environmental improvements, and provision of infrastructure. ERDF funds also play a role in attracting further investments from both private and public sectors.

Enterprise Ireland is an Irish state economic development agency focused on helping Irish-owned business deliver new export sales.
nodes.abstract:
新加坡国立大学（NUS）是亚洲领先的全球大学之一，以其卓越的教育和研究而闻名。自其成立以来，NUS一直致力于培养未来的领导者和创新者。该大学提供广泛的学科，包括工程、医学和社会科学，以满足全球的挑战。NUS不仅是学术研究的中心，还与企业和政府机构合作，推动社会和经济创新。

The National University of Singapore (NUS) is one of Asia's leading global universities, renowned for its excellence in education and research. Since its inception, NUS has been dedicated to nurturing future leaders and innovators. The university offers a broad range of disciplines, from engineering and medicine to social sciences, addressing global challenges. NUS is not just a hub for academic research but also collaborates with businesses and governmental agencies to drive social and economic innovations.

nodes.label: 国际工业设计协会International Council of Societies of Industrial Design(ICSID)
nodes.issued: 《艾哈迈达巴德宣言》|《世界设计之都开普敦：设计政策参考》
nodes.participated: 《设计中的女性-代表ICSID和 Icograda进行的探索性调查》|《日本设计政策手册2007》|《日本设计政策手册2008》|《日本设计政策手册2009》|《日本设计政策手册2014》
nodes.category: 政府部门及区域性政府间组织
nodes.description:
国际工业设计协会（ICSID）现已更名为世界设计组织（WDO）。该组织成立于1957年，最初由12个专业设计协会组成，旨在推广工业设计职业。随着时间的推移，它发展成为一个全球性的实体，包括来自40多个国家的170多个成员组织，代表着估计有150,000名设计师。这种增长反映了成员组织的协作参与和国际认可。
在2015年10月的一个大会上，成员们批准了组织的新愿景和使命，并批准了将组织名称更改为世界设计组织，标志着它发展历程中的重要转折。这个转变也带来了一个新的名字——世界设计组织，以更好地概括其更广泛的范围和全球影响力。现在作为WDO，该组织继续秉承其创立理念，通过推广工业设计在创建更好的产品、系统、服务和体验中的作用，从而被视为促进更好的商业和行业实践的途径，最终为实现更好的环境和社会做出贡献。
WDO还获得了联合国特别协商地位，展示了它在全球设计和工业领域的重要地位。该组织在2022年庆祝了成立65周年，回顾了为实现更美好世界而倡导设计的六十多年历史。
The International Council of Societies of Industrial Design (ICSID) is now known as the World Design Organization (WDO). Established in 1957 with 12 founding professional design associations, it aimed to promote the industrial design profession. Over time, it evolved into a global entity, encompassing over 170 member organizations from more than 40 nations, representing an estimated 150,000 designers. This growth reflects the collaborative engagement and international recognition of the member organizations' voices.
The transformation from ICSID to WDO was officially enacted in October 2015 during a general assembly where members approved a renewed vision and mission for the organization, marking a pivotal shift in its journey. This transition also came with a new name, the World Design Organization, to better encapsulate its broader scope and global outreach. Now as WDO, the organization continues to uphold its founding ideals by promoting industrial design's role in creating better products, systems, services, and experiences. This, in turn, is seen as a pathway to fostering better business and industry practices, and ultimately, contributing to a better environment and society.
WDO also has a special consultative status with the United Nations, showcasing its significant stance in the global design and industrial sphere. The organization commemorated its 65th anniversary in 2022, reflecting on over six decades of championing design for a better world.
nodes.abstract:
国际工业设计协会（ICSID）现已更名为世界设计组织（WDO）。该组织成立于1957年，最初由12个专业设计协会组成，旨在推广工业设计职业。随着时间的推移，它发展成为一个全球性的实体，包括来自40多个国家的170多个成员组织，代表着估计有150,000名设计师。这种增长反映了成员组织的协作参与和国际认可。
在2015年10月的一个大会上，成员们批准了组织的新愿景和使命，并批准了将组织名称更改为世界设计组织，标志着它发展历程中的重要转折。这个转变也带来了一个新的名字——世界设计组织，以更好地概括其更广泛的范围和全球影响力。现在作为WDO，该组织继续秉承其创立理念，通过推广工业设计在创建更好的产品、系统、服务和体验中的作用，从而被视为促进更好的商业和行业实践的途径，最终为实现更好的环境和社会做出贡献。
WDO还获得了联合国特别协商地位，展示了它在全球设计和工业领域的重要地位。该组织在2022年庆祝了成立65周年，回顾了为实现更美好世界而倡导设计的六十多年历史。
The International Council of Societies of Industrial Design (ICSID) is now known as the World Design Organization (WDO). Established in 1957 with 12 founding professional design associations, it aimed to promote the industrial design profession. Over time, it evolved into a global entity, encompassing over 170 member organizations from more than 40 nations, representing an estimated 150,000 designers. This growth reflects the collaborative engagement and international recognition of the member organizations' voices.
The transformation from ICSID to WDO was officially enacted in October 2015 during a general assembly where members approved a renewed vision and mission for the organization, marking a pivotal shift in its journey. This transition also came with a new name, the World Design Organization, to better encapsulate its broader scope and global outreach. Now as WDO, the organization continues to uphold its founding ideals by promoting industrial design's role in creating better products, systems, services, and experiences. This, in turn, is seen as a pathway to fostering better business and industry practices, and ultimately, contributing to a better environment and society.
WDO also has a special consultative status with the United Nations, showcasing its significant stance in the global design and industrial sphere. The organization commemorated its 65th anniversary in 2022, reflecting on over six decades of championing design for a better world.

新加坡国立大学（NUS）是亚洲领先的全球大学之一，以其卓越的教育和研究而闻名。自其成立以来，NUS一直致力于培养未来的领导者和创新者。该大学提供广泛的学科，包括工程、医学和社会科学，以满足全球的挑战。NUS不仅是学术研究的中心，还与企业和政府机构合作，推动社会和经济创新。

The National University of Singapore (NUS) is one of Asia's leading global universities, renowned for its excellence in education and research. Since its inception, NUS has been dedicated to nurturing future leaders and innovators. The university offers a broad range of disciplines, from engineering and medicine to social sciences, addressing global challenges. NUS is not just a hub for academic research but also collaborates with businesses and governmental agencies to drive social and economic innovations.

nodes.label: 日本手工艺设计协会Japan Craft Design Association(JCDA)
nodes.participated: 《日本设计政策手册2007》|《日本设计政策手册2008》|《日本设计政策手册2009》|《日本设计政策手册2014》|《日本设计政策手册2018》|《日本设计政策手册2020》
nodes.description:
日本手工艺设计协会（JCDA）是一个致力于推广和保护日本传统手工艺和设计的组织。协会支持艺术家、设计师和手工艺者，提供各种培训和展示机会，以及推动与国内外机构的合作。JCDA的目标是确保日本的传统和创新设计得到适当的认可和传承，同时鼓励新一代的创作者继续发展这一丰富的文化遗产。

The Japan Craft Design Association (JCDA) is an organization dedicated to promoting and preserving traditional Japanese craftsmanship and design. The association supports artists, designers, and craftsmen by providing various training and showcasing opportunities, as well as facilitating collaborations with institutions both domestically and abroad. JCDA's mission is to ensure that traditional and innovative designs from Japan receive proper recognition and preservation, while encouraging the new generation of creators to continue developing this rich cultural heritage.

nodes.description:
日本标识设计协会（SDA）是一个专门研究和推广标识设计的组织。该协会认为，有效的标识设计不仅提供导向信息，还可以为公共和私人空间增添美感。SDA提供各种资源和培训，以支持和提升行业的专业水平，同时也鼓励其会员在设计过程中考虑可持续性和环境因素。

The Sign Design Association of Japan (SDA) is an organization dedicated to the study and promotion of sign design. The association believes that effective sign design not only provides directional information but also adds aesthetic value to public and private spaces. SDA offers various resources and training to support and elevate the professional standard of the industry, and it also encourages its members to consider sustainability and environmental factors in the design process.

日本室内设计师协会（JID）是一个专业组织，致力于推进和支持日本的室内设计行业。这个协会为室内设计师提供了一个平台，让他们分享经验、交流想法和最佳实践，同时也为他们提供培训和发展的机会。JID强调室内设计在创造舒适、实用和美观的生活空间中的重要性，并鼓励其会员追求创新和卓越。

The Japan Interior Designers' Association (JID) is a professional body dedicated to advancing and supporting the interior design industry in Japan. The association provides a platform for interior designers to share experiences, exchange ideas, and best practices, while also offering opportunities for training and development. JID underscores the significance of interior design in creating comfortable, functional, and aesthetically pleasing living spaces and encourages its members to strive for innovation and excellence.

nodes.label: 日本工业设计师协会Japan Industrial Designers' Association(JIDA)
nodes.participated: 《日本设计政策手册2007》|《日本设计政策手册2008》|《日本设计政策手册2009》|《日本设计政策手册2014》|《日本设计政策手册2014》|《日本设计政策手册2020》
nodes.description:
日本工业设计师协会是日本工业设计领域的专业组织，致力于提升设计质量和促进工业设计的发展。JIDA通过组织设计比赛、展览和研讨会等活动，促进设计师之间的交流与合作，同时推动公众对工业设计的认知和理解。

The Japan Industrial Designers' Association is a professional organization in Japan focused on improving design quality and advancing industrial design. JIDA facilitates interaction and cooperation among designers through competitions, exhibitions, and seminars, also enhancing public awareness and understanding of industrial design.
nodes.abstract:
新加坡国立大学（NUS）是亚洲领先的全球大学之一，以其卓越的教育和研究而闻名。自其成立以来，NUS一直致力于培养未来的领导者和创新者。该大学提供广泛的学科，包括工程、医学和社会科学，以满足全球的挑战。NUS不仅是学术研究的中心，还与企业和政府机构合作，推动社会和经济创新。

The National University of Singapore (NUS) is one of Asia's leading global universities, renowned for its excellence in education and research. Since its inception, NUS has been dedicated to nurturing future leaders and innovators. The university offers a broad range of disciplines, from engineering and medicine to social sciences, addressing global challenges. NUS is not just a hub for academic research but also collaborates with businesses and governmental agencies to drive social and economic innovations.

nodes.label: 爱尔兰工业发展局Industrial Development Agency(IDA) Ireland
nodes.participated: 《爱尔兰国家设计政策》|《爱尔兰企业设计政策框架》|《爱尔兰设计足迹：经济价值和特征》|《设计在爱尔兰非设计密集型行业中的公司的作用和重要性研究》|《创造力、设计和创新技能》
nodes.category: 政府部门及区域性政府间组织
nodes.description:
爱尔兰投资发展局（IDA Ireland）是负责爱尔兰吸引和保留外来直接投资（FDI）的机构。
IDA Ireland  is the agency responsible for the attraction and retention of inward foreign direct investment (FDI) into Ireland.

nodes.label_short: 爱尔兰设计与手工艺委员会
nodes.issued: 《国家设计战略咨询文件》|《爱尔兰国家设计政策》
nodes.participated: 《爱尔兰企业设计政策框架》|《爱尔兰设计足迹：经济价值和特征》|《设计在爱尔兰非设计密集型行业中的公司的作用和重要性研究》
nodes.description:
爱尔兰设计与手工艺委员会Design&Crafts Council Ireland (DCCI) 是一个支持和促进爱尔兰设计和手工艺产业的机构。DCCI为设计师和工匠提供培训、资源和机会，以增强他们的创业和创新能力，并增加他们的作品在国际市场上的知名度。

The Design & Crafts Council Ireland (DCCI) is an institution that supports and promotes the design and craft industry in Ireland. DCCI provides designers and craftspeople with training, resources, and opportunities to enhance their entrepreneurial and innovative capabilities and to elevate the profile of their work on an international stage.

nodes.label: 商业与文化发展中心Business and Cultural Development Centre(KEPA)
nodes.issued: 《设计4：创新：设计行动计划-希腊》
nodes.participated: 《欧洲经验分享：政策创新设计》(2014.6)|《欧洲经验分享，政策创新设计》(2014.12)|《设计政策监测2015，审查整个欧洲的创新和设计政策》
nodes.description:
商业与文化发展中心（KEPA），成立于1991年，是一个位于希腊塞萨洛尼基的非营利组织，由北希腊工业联合会和希腊国际商业协会共同创立。KEPA致力于管理和实施各种国家和欧洲项目，支持私人企业。该中心通过参与EU资助的项目，在设计思维、微型金融和社会经济等领域积累了丰富的经验，并创立了希腊设计中心，以推动公共和私营部门的创新和竞争力。

The Business and Cultural Development Centre (KEPA), established in 1991 in Thessaloniki, Greece, is a non-profit organization co-founded by the Federation of Industries of Northern Greece and the Greek International Business Association. KEPA is dedicated to managing and implementing various national and European projects to support private enterprise. It has accumulated extensive experience in design thinking, microfinance, and the social economy through EU-funded projects and established the Hellenic Design Centre to promote innovation and competitiveness in both public and private sectors.

nodes.label: 分享欧洲经验平台SEE Sharing Experience Europe
nodes.issued: 《政策小册子5：欧洲设计系统和创新政策》|《欧洲经验分享：政策创新设计》(2014.6)|《欧洲经验分享，政策创新设计》(2014.12)|《设计政策监测2015，审查整个欧洲的创新和设计政策》
nodes.description:
欧洲经验共享（SEE）平台是一项合作倡议，旨在促进欧洲各地区的政策创新和设计。该平台与不同国家的多个设计和发展组织建立了联系。参与该平台的合作伙伴包括威尔士设计协会/卡迪夫城市大学（在英国担任协调人）、佛兰德斯设计协会（比利时）、南波西米亚地区发展局（捷克共和国）、丹麦设计中心（丹麦）、爱沙尼亚设计中心（爱沙尼亚）和阿尔托大学（芬兰）。
The Sharing Experience Europe (SEE) platform is a collaborative initiative aimed at promoting policy innovation and design across various regions in Europe. The platform has connections with several design and development organizations across different countries. Some of the partners involved in this platform include Design Wales / Cardiff Metropolitan University (which acts as the coordinator in the UK), Design Flanders (Belgium), the Regional Development Agency of South Bohemia RERA (Czech Republic), the Danish Design Centre (Denmark), the Estonian Design Centre (Estonia), and Aalto University (Finland).

nodes.label: 新加坡设计委员会DesignSingapore Council
nodes.issued: 《设计2025》|《“可爱的新加坡 "项目报告》|《国家设计产业与人力研究》
nodes.participated: 《新加坡和韩国，设计作为公共政策的工具》
nodes.description:
新加坡设计委员会（DesignSingapore Council）是新加坡的一个政府机构，旨在帮助和促进设计行业的发展和创新。该委员会成立于2003年，其主要目标是使新加坡成为亚洲的设计中心，并通过设计来驱动经济创新和增长。
新加坡设计委员会致力于推广设计思维、培养设计人才、鼓励企业和公众采用设计，以及通过各种项目和合作伙伴关系来增强新加坡的设计生态系统。该委员会还为设计公司和专业人士提供资金和资源支持，以推动他们在全球竞争中取得成功。

The DesignSingapore Council is a governmental agency in Singapore dedicated to advancing and promoting the design sector and innovation. Established in 2003, its primary aim is to make Singapore a hub for design in Asia and to drive economic innovation and growth through design.
The DesignSingapore Council is committed to promoting design thinking, nurturing design talent, encouraging businesses and the public to embrace design, and enhancing Singapore's design ecosystem through various programs and partnerships. The council also provides funding and resources to design firms and professionals to help them succeed in a global competition.

nodes.label: 国际室内建筑师/设计师联合会International Federation of Interior Architects/Designers(IFI)
nodes.label_short: 国际室内建筑师/设计师联合会
nodes.participated: 《日本设计政策手册2007》|《日本设计政策手册2008》|《日本设计政策手册2009》|《日本设计政策手册2014》
nodes.description:
国际室内建筑师/设计师联合会（IFI）是全球室内建筑和设计行业的主要国际组织。自1963年成立以来，IFI一直在推进室内设计的专业、教育和领导地位。该组织致力于将室内设计作为改善人类生活质量和文化的工具，同时促进国际间的交流和合作。

The International Federation of Interior Architects/Designers (IFI) is the global voice and authority for professionals in the interior architecture and design industry. Established in 1963, IFI has been at the forefront of advancing the professional recognition, education, and leadership of interior design. The organization champions interior design as a tool for bettering human quality of life and culture and fosters international exchange and collaboration.

nodes.label: 国际设计中心股份有限公司International Design Center Co., Ltd.(IdcN)
nodes.label_short: 国际设计中心股份有限公司
nodes.participated: 《日本设计政策手册2007》|《日本设计政策手册2008》|《日本设计政策手册2009》|《日本设计政策手册2014》
nodes.description:
国际设计中心股份有限公司(IdcN)是一个致力于推进设计思维和实践的公司。通过举办各种设计展览、研讨会和培训活动，IdcN为设计师、企业家和其他创意专业人士提供了一个交流和学习的平台。此外，IdcN还与多个设计学院和机构合作，推进设计教育和研究。作为设计行业的领军者，IdcN不仅致力于提高设计的商业价值，还努力在社会和文化层面上推广设计的重要性。

International Design Center Co., Ltd. (IdcN) is a company dedicated to advancing design thinking and practice. Through various design exhibitions, seminars, and training events, IdcN provides a platform for designers, entrepreneurs, and other creative professionals to interact and learn. Furthermore, IdcN collaborates with several design schools and institutions to promote design education and research. As a leader in the design industry, IdcN is committed not only to enhancing the commercial value of design but also to promoting its significance on a social and cultural level.

nodes.label_short: 日本通用设计保护协会
nodes.participated: 《日本设计政策手册2007》|《日本设计政策手册2008》|《日本设计政策手册2009》|《日本设计政策手册2014》
nodes.description:
日本通用设计促进协会致力于在日本推进通用设计。该协会与各行各业合作，开发和实施所有人（无论年龄、能力或其他因素）都能使用的设计，以促进建立一个更具包容性的社会。

The Japan Universal Design Promotion Association is dedicated to advancing universal design in Japan. It collaborates with various sectors to develop and implement designs that are accessible to all, regardless of age, ability, or other factors, fostering a more inclusive society.

nodes.issued: 《澳大利亚设计战略2.0》|《设计的角色和价值》|《设计政策：澳大利亚设计协会自由推销政策》|《澳大利亚设计协会年度报告：2021-2022》
nodes.description:
澳大利亚设计协会是澳大利亚领先的多学科设计组织，致力于推动该国的设计行业。DIA为设计师提供职业发展、网络和资源，同时也为公众提供设计信息和教育。

The Design Institute of Australia (DIA) is Australia's foremost multidisciplinary design organization, dedicated to advancing the design profession in the country. DIA offers professional development, networking, and resources for designers, while also providing design information and education to the public.

nodes.label: 欧盟-东部伙伴关系计划EU-Eastern Partnership Culture and Creativity Programme
nodes.label_short: 欧盟-东部伙伴关系计划
nodes.issued: 《乌克兰：从设计思维到设计行动计划研讨会记录》|《在阿塞拜疆发展文化创意产业》|《在格鲁吉亚发展文化创意产业》|《在亚美尼亚发展文化创意产业》
nodes.category: 政府部门及区域性政府间组织
nodes.description:
欧盟-东部伙伴关系文化和创意计划是一个旨在支持东欧和南高加索地区国家文化和创意产业发展的项目。该项目提供资金、培训和技术支持，帮助这些国家的文化和创意部门实现其潜力，同时增强其在全球市场上的竞争力。这一计划也强调了文化和创意产业对经济增长和社会融合的重要性。

The EU-Eastern Partnership Culture and Creativity Programme is an initiative aimed at supporting the development of the cultural and creative industries in Eastern European and South Caucasus countries. The program provides funding, training, and technical assistance to help the cultural and creative sectors of these nations realize their potential while bolstering their competitiveness in the global market. The initiative also underscores the importance of cultural and creative industries for economic growth and societal integration.

欧盟-东部伙伴关系文化和创意计划是一个旨在支持东欧和南高加索地区国家文化和创意产业发展的项目。该项目提供资金、培训和技术支持，帮助这些国家的文化和创意部门实现其潜力，同时增强其在全球市场上的竞争力。这一计划也强调了文化和创意产业对经济增长和社会融合的重要性。

The EU-Eastern Partnership Culture and Creativity Programme is an initiative aimed at supporting the development of the cultural and creative industries in Eastern European and South Caucasus countries. The program provides funding, training, and technical assistance to help the cultural and creative sectors of these nations realize their potential while bolstering their competitiveness in the global market. The initiative also underscores the importance of cultural and creative industries for economic growth and societal integration.

nodes.label: 英国议会设计委员会Design Commission
nodes.issued: 《重启英国1：设计教育与成长》|《重启英国2：设计和公共服务》
nodes.participated: 《设计经济：人物、地点和经济价值》
nodes.description:
英国设计委员会是一个跨党派组织，致力于在英国议会内促进关于设计和创新的讨论和研究。该委员会相信设计在推动经济、社会和文化发展中发挥了关键作用，并进行各种研究和倡导活动，以确保设计在政策制定中被充分考虑。

The Design Commission is a cross-party group dedicated to championing discussions and investigations about design and innovation within the UK Parliament. The commission believes in the pivotal role design plays in driving economic, societal, and cultural advancements, and conducts various research and advocacy activities to ensure design is duly considered in policy-making.

The European Commission is the executive body of the European Union, responsible for proposing new legislation, managing and executing EU policies, allocating EU funds, and representing the EU in international affairs.

nodes.label: 佛兰德设计Design Flanders
nodes.participated: 《欧洲经验分享：政策创新设计》(2014.6)|《欧洲经验分享，政策创新设计》(2014.12)|《设计政策监测2015，审查整个欧洲的创新和设计政策》
nodes.description:
佛兰德设计（Design Flanders）是一个位于比利时佛兰德地区的设计推广机构。该机构的主要目的是支持和提升佛兰德地区的设计师和设计企业，强化他们在国内和国际上的地位。通过组织各种展览、活动和研讨会，佛兰德设计不仅促进了佛兰德地区的设计文化和商业活动，还助力佛兰德设计师与其他国家的设计师建立了联系。该机构重视设计在当今社会中的价值，尤其是在经济、社会和文化领域的重要性，因此致力于推广设计思维，并强调设计可以为社会带来的积极变化。

Design Flanders, based in the Flemish region of Belgium, is a design promotion agency. Its primary aim is to support and elevate designers and design companies in the Flemish region, solidifying their position both domestically and internationally. Through organizing various exhibitions, events, and seminars, Design Flanders not only promotes design culture and commercial activities in the region but also helps Flemish designers connect with their counterparts from other countries. The institution values the role of design in contemporary society, especially its significance in the economic, social, and cultural domains. Hence, it's dedicated to propagating design thinking and underlining the positive transformations design can render to society.

nodes.label: 贾姆克应用科学大学JAMK University of Applied Sciences
nodes.participated: 《欧洲经验分享：政策创新设计》(2014.6)|《欧洲经验分享，政策创新设计》(2014.12)|《设计政策监测2015，审查整个欧洲的创新和设计政策》
nodes.description:
芬兰 JAMK 应用科学大学以重视实践技能和专业教育而闻名。该大学提供广泛的本科和研究生课程，将理论知识与实际应用相结合，为学生在各个领域成功就业做好准备。

JAMK University of Applied Sciences in Finland is known for its strong emphasis on practical skills and professional education. It offers a wide range of undergraduate and postgraduate programs that combine theoretical knowledge with real-world applications, preparing students for successful careers in various fields.
nodes.abstract:
新加坡国立大学（NUS）是亚洲领先的全球大学之一，以其卓越的教育和研究而闻名。自其成立以来，NUS一直致力于培养未来的领导者和创新者。该大学提供广泛的学科，包括工程、医学和社会科学，以满足全球的挑战。NUS不仅是学术研究的中心，还与企业和政府机构合作，推动社会和经济创新。

The National University of Singapore (NUS) is one of Asia's leading global universities, renowned for its excellence in education and research. Since its inception, NUS has been dedicated to nurturing future leaders and innovators. The university offers a broad range of disciplines, from engineering and medicine to social sciences, addressing global challenges. NUS is not just a hub for academic research but also collaborates with businesses and governmental agencies to drive social and economic innovations.

nodes.label: 南波希米亚区域发展机构Regional Development Agency of South Bohemia(RERA)
nodes.label_short: 南波希米亚区域发展机构
nodes.participated: 《欧洲经验分享：政策创新设计》(2014.6)|《欧洲经验分享，政策创新设计》(2014.12)|《设计政策监测2015，审查整个欧洲的创新和设计政策》
nodes.description:
南波希米亚区域发展机构（RERA）是一个致力于南波希米亚地区的经济和社会发展的组织。它为当地企业、政府和社区提供支持，以促进区域的经济增长和社会福祉。通过与各种利益相关者合作，RERA设计和实施了一系列项目和措施，旨在提高区域的竞争力、创新能力和可持续性。

The Regional Development Agency of South Bohemia (RERA) is an organization dedicated to the economic and social development of the South Bohemian region. It provides support to local businesses, governments, and communities to promote economic growth and societal well-being in the region. Collaborating with various stakeholders, RERA designs and implements a range of projects and measures aimed at enhancing the region's competitiveness, innovative capacity, and sustainability.

nodes.label: 爱沙尼亚设计中心Estonian Design Centre
nodes.participated: 《欧洲经验分享：政策创新设计》(2014.6)|《欧洲经验分享，政策创新设计》(2014.12)|《设计政策监测2015，审查整个欧洲的创新和设计政策》
nodes.description:
爱沙尼亚设计中心是爱沙尼亚的主要设计机构，致力于提高该国设计领域的知名度和影响力。它通过各种活动、培训和项目，为设计师和企业提供支持和资源。中心的主要目标是提高爱沙尼亚的设计水平，促进设计思维，并将设计融入更多的行业和领域。

The Estonian Design Centre is Estonia's premier design institution dedicated to enhancing the recognition and impact of the design sector in the country. It provides support and resources to designers and businesses through various activities, training, and projects. The centre's main objectives are to elevate design standards in Estonia, promote design thinking, and integrate design into more industries and areas.

nodes.label: 米兰理工大学Politecnico di Milano
nodes.issued: 《行动工作坊中的设计政策》
nodes.participated: 《欧洲政策中的设计：设计政策问题》|《欧洲设计政策》
nodes.description:
米兰理工大学是意大利最古老和最重要的技术大学之一，自1863年以来一直在工程、建筑和设计领域取得了杰出的成果。这所大学与多家全球顶级公司和研究机构合作，为学生提供了独特的学术和职业机会。米兰理工大学以其在研究和创新中的卓越成果而闻名。

Politecnico di Milano is one of Italy's oldest and most significant technical universities, having consistently demonstrated excellence in the fields of engineering, architecture, and design since 1863. The university collaborates with several top global corporations and research institutions, offering its students unique academic and professional opportunities. Politecnico di Milano is renowned for its stellar accomplishments in research and innovation.

nodes.label: The Work Foundation
nodes.participated: 15号文件《创意、设计和商业表现》|《欧洲政策中的设计：设计政策问题》|《欧洲设计政策》
nodes.description:
The Work Foundation（工作基金会）是英国的一个研究机构，专注于研究和分析劳动市场、就业和工作领域的重要问题。它旨在为政府、企业、政策制定者和学术界提供关于劳动力市场的见解和建议，以促进更好的就业机会和劳动力市场的发展。

工作基金会的研究范围涵盖就业政策、职业发展、薪酬、劳工关系、劳动力市场趋势等方面的议题。它的研究旨在帮助塑造政策，改进工作条件，促进劳动力市场的包容性和可持续性。

工作基金会是一个独立的研究机构，总部位于英国。它的研究成果和报告通常会对政府政策和商业实践产生影响，以推动更好的劳动力市场和职业发展。

nodes.label: 日本手工艺中心Craft Center Japan(CCJ)
nodes.participated: 《日本设计政策手册2007》|《日本设计政策手册2008》|《日本设计政策手册2014》
nodes.description:
日本工艺中心致力于保护和推广日本传统工艺。它是一个资源和教育中心，提供有关各种日本手工艺技术的讲习班、展览和信息，帮助保持这些历史做法的活力和相关性。

Craft Center Japan is committed to preserving and promoting traditional Japanese crafts. It serves as a resource and educational center, offering workshops, exhibitions, and information on a diverse range of Japanese craft techniques, helping to keep these historic practices alive and relevant.

The university offers a broad range of disciplines, from engineering and medicine to social sciences, addressing global challenges. nodes.label: 日本空间设计协会Japan Design Space Association(DSA)
nodes.participated: 《日本设计政策手册2014》|《日本设计政策手册2018》|《日本设计政策手册2020》
nodes.description:
日本空间设计协会专注于空间设计，旨在提高日本建筑和城市空间的质量和功能。该协会汇集了来自不同领域的专业人士，共同合作开展项目，以提高环境的宜居性和美感。

The Japan Design Space Association focuses on spatial design and aims to enhance the quality and functionality of architectural and urban spaces in Japan. It brings together professionals from various fields to collaborate on projects that improve the livability and aesthetics of environments.

nodes.label: 日本显示设计协会Japan Display Design Association(DDA)
nodes.participated: 《日本设计政策手册2007》|《日本设计政策手册2008》|《日本设计政策手册2009》
nodes.description:
日本显示设计协会（DDA）是一个致力于展览和展示设计的专业组织。它为从事此类工作的设计师提供一个平台，以分享经验、交流想法和最佳实践。DDA重视在各种公共和私人空间中创造引人注目、功能性和有意义的展示设计的重要性。此外，协会还组织各种培训、研讨会和展览，以提高行业的专业水平并为会员提供进一步的学习和发展机会。

The Japan Display Design Association (DDA) is a professional organization dedicated to exhibition and display design. It provides a platform for designers involved in this work to share experiences, exchange ideas, and best practices. DDA emphasizes the importance of creating eye-catching, functional, and meaningful display designs in various public and private spaces. Furthermore, the association organizes various training sessions, seminars, and exhibitions to raise the professional standard of the industry and offer further learning and development opportunities for its members.

nodes.label: 日本工业设计振兴机构Japan Industrial Design Promotion Organization(JIDPO)
nodes.label_short: 日本工业设计振兴机构
nodes.participated: 《日本设计政策手册2008》|《日本设计政策手册2009》|《日本设计政策手册2020》
nodes.description:
日本工业设计振兴机构（JIDPO）自1969年成立以来，一直致力于提升和弘扬日本的工业设计水平。该机构认为工业设计不仅仅是外观设计，更是连接技术与消费者的桥梁，能够为社会、经济和文化的持续发展作出贡献。为了实现这一宗旨，JIDPO每年都会举办各种评奖、展览和研讨会等活动。这些活动不仅能够提高公众对于工业设计的认知，也为设计师们提供了一个展示和交流的平台。此外，JIDPO还与教育机构、工业界和政府部门紧密合作，为工业设计的教育和研发提供支持。

The Japan Industrial Design Promotion Organization (JIDPO), established in 1969, has been dedicated to elevating and promoting the level of industrial design in Japan. The organization believes that industrial design is not just about aesthetics; it serves as a bridge connecting technology and consumers and contributes to the continuous development of society, economy, and culture. To achieve this aim, JIDPO organizes various award ceremonies, exhibitions, and seminars annually. These activities not only raise public awareness about industrial design but also offer designers a platform to showcase and exchange ideas. Moreover, JIDPO collaborates closely with educational institutions, industries, and government departments to support the education and research of industrial design.
nodes.abstract:
日本工业设计振兴机构（JIDPO）自1969年成立以来，一直致力于提升和弘扬日本的工业设计水平。该机构认为工业设计不仅仅是外观设计，更是连接技术与消费者的桥梁，能够为社会、经济和文化的持续发展作出贡献。为了实现这一宗旨，JIDPO每年都会举办各种评奖、展览和研讨会等活动。这些活动不仅能够提高公众对于工业设计的认知，也为设计师们提供了一个展示和交流的平台。此外，JIDPO还与教育机构、工业界和政府部门紧密合作，为工业设计的教育和研发提供支持。

The Japan Industrial Design Promotion Organization (JIDPO), established in 1969, has been dedicated to elevating and promoting the level of industrial design in Japan. The organization believes that industrial design is not just about aesthetics; it serves as a bridge connecting technology and consumers and contributes to the continuous development of society, economy, and culture. To achieve this aim, JIDPO organizes various award ceremonies, exhibitions, and seminars annually. These activities not only raise public awareness about industrial design but also offer designers a platform to showcase and exchange ideas. Moreover, JIDPO collaborates closely with educational institutions, industries, and government departments to support the education and research of industrial design.

nodes.label: 爱尔兰设计师协会The Institute of Designers in Ireland (IDI)
nodes.participated: 《国家设计战略咨询文件》|《爱尔兰国家设计政策》|《爱尔兰设计服务行业研究》
nodes.description:
爱尔兰设计师协会（The Institute of Designers in Ireland, IDI）成立于1972年，是爱尔兰国内最大、历史最悠久的设计专业组织。IDI致力于提升设计的价值和影响力，通过支持和学习，激发爱尔兰设计师的创造力。该协会在本地和国家层面组织活动，倡导和推广爱尔兰设计，并为资格设计师和正在取得资格的设计师提供代表和支持。IDI还经常举办设计奖项和活动，以表彰优秀设计师的成就，并通过其活动和资源支持会员的专业发展.

The Institute of Designers in Ireland (IDI) was established in 1972 and stands as the largest and most historic professional design association in Ireland. IDI is dedicated to advancing the value and impact of design by fostering a community of designers who support and inspire each other. It organizes locally and nationally to promote and advocate for Irish design. IDI also engages in various activities to support the professional development of its members, including award programs and events that celebrate and recognize excellence in Irish design.
nodes.abstract:
新加坡国立大学（NUS）是亚洲领先的全球大学之一，以其卓越的教育和研究而闻名。自其成立以来，NUS一直致力于培养未来的领导者和创新者。该大学提供广泛的学科，包括工程、医学和社会科学，以满足全球的挑战。NUS不仅是学术研究的中心，还与企业和政府机构合作，推动社会和经济创新。

The National University of Singapore (NUS) is one of Asia's leading global universities, renowned for its excellence in education and research. Since its inception, NUS has been dedicated to nurturing future leaders and innovators. The university offers a broad range of disciplines, from engineering and medicine to social sciences, addressing global challenges. NUS is not just a hub for academic research but also collaborates with businesses and governmental agencies to drive social and economic innovations.

nodes.label: 爱尔兰科学基金会Science Foundation Ireland(SFI)
nodes.participated: 《爱尔兰企业设计政策框架》|《爱尔兰设计足迹：经济价值和特征》|《设计在爱尔兰非设计密集型行业中的公司的作用和重要性研究》
nodes.description:
爱尔兰科学基金会（SFI）是爱尔兰政府的一个机构，主要负责在生物医学、信息和通信技术、能源与环境等领域提供研究资助。它的主要目标是通过支持前沿研究，推进爱尔兰在全球的科学和工程领域中的领导地位。此外，SFI还与大学、研究机构和工业合作，促进知识转移和技术创新，以驱动经济增长和社会福祉。

Science Foundation Ireland (SFI) is an agency of the Irish government primarily responsible for funding research in areas such as biomedicine, information and communications technology, and energy and the environment. Its main goal is to advance Ireland's leadership in the global fields of science and engineering through support for cutting-edge research. Additionally, SFI collaborates with universities, research institutions, and industries to promote knowledge transfer and technological innovation, driving economic growth and societal well-being.

蒙特利尔设计局是蒙特利尔市的一个组织，致力于提升城市的设计文化和质量。该局通过各种项目、比赛和活动，推广设计在城市发展中的重要性，同时鼓励和支持本地设计师和实践者。

The Montréal Bureau du design is an organization of the city of Montréal dedicated to elevating the design culture and quality in the city. The bureau promotes the importance of design in urban development through various projects, competitions, and activities, while also encouraging and supporting local designers and practitioners.

nodes.category: 政府部门及区域性政府间组织
nodes.description:
韩国知识经济部Ministry of Knowledge Economy，现在已更名为韩国未来创新部，主要负责韩国的科技、信息和通讯技术、能源和资源政策。它致力于推进韩国的知识经济，促进技术创新和研究，以及推动国家的经济增长和全球竞争力。

The Ministry of Knowledge Economy of South Korea, now renamed as the Ministry of Future Creation and Science, oversees South Korea's policies on technology, information and communication technologies, energy, and resources. It aims to advance South Korea's knowledge-based economy, foster technological innovation and research, and drive the nation's economic growth and global competitiveness.

艺术与人文研究理事会（AHRC），前身为艺术与人文研究委员会（AHRB），是英国的一个研究理事会，成立于 1998 年，支持艺术与人文领域的研究和研究生学习。
The Arts and Humanities Research Council (AHRC), formerly Arts and Humanities Research Board (AHRB), is a British research council, established in 1998, supporting research and postgraduate study in the arts and humanities.

nodes.label: Capita
nodes.participated: 《重启英国2：设计和公共服务》|《设计我们的未来：维多利亚州高等设计教育报告》
nodes.description: Capita plc 是一家总部位于英国的国际业务流程外包和专业服务公司。它为客户提供各种服务，包括IT外包、人力资源管理、客户管理服务、管理咨询和其他一些业务流程服务。Capita运营于多个部门和市场，包括公共和私营部门。自其成立以来，Capita逐渐扩大了业务范围，并在多个领域成为领先的服务供应商。

nodes.label: 艺术与设计高等教育委员会Council for Higher Education in Art and Design(CHEAD)
nodes.label_short: 艺术与设计高等教育委员会
nodes.participated: 《重启英国1：设计教育与成长》|《设计经济：人物、地点和经济价值》
nodes.category: 政府部门及区域性政府间组织
nodes.description:
CHEAD 是英国艺术与设计高等教育部门 (HE AMD) 的代表机构。其使命是促进艺术与设计高等教育界的发展、地位和声望以及与外部世界的联系。CHEAD为英国四国的艺术与设计高等教育界提供领导力，是一个具有包容性和凝聚力的机构，代表艺术与设计高等教育界，促进艺术与设计高等教育界的知识和了解，并向政府和其他利益相关者宣传艺术与设计高等教育界的利益。
CHEAD is the representative body for the art and design higher education sector (HE AMD) in the UK. Its mission is to contribute to the development of the AMD community, its standing and stature as well as its engagement with the outside world. CHEAD provides leadership and an inclusive, cohesive body for and on behalf of HE AMD in the UK four nations, advancing knowledge and understanding in the sector and promoting the sector’s interests to government and other stakeholders.

nodes.label: 新加坡城市更新局Urban Redevelopment Authority(URA)
nodes.participated: 《“可爱的新加坡 "项目报告》|《新加坡和韩国，设计作为公共政策的工具》
nodes.category: 政府部门及区域性政府间组织
nodes.description:
新加坡城市更新局Urban Redevelopment Authority(URA)是新加坡的国家土地使用规划和保护机构，其使命是使新加坡成为一个宜居、宜业、宜游的城市。市建局在制定新加坡城市未来战略方面发挥着至关重要的作用，通过整合土地使用规划和保护战略，确保可持续发展并保持高品质的生活。市建局以其全面的规划而闻名，如总体规划和概念规划，长期指导新加坡的物质发展。

The Urban Redevelopment Authority (URA) is Singapore’s national land-use planning and conservation agency, established with a mission to make Singapore a great city to live, work, and play. The URA plays a crucial role in strategizing for Singapore's urban future, ensuring sustainable growth and maintaining a high quality of life by integrating land use planning and conservation strategies. It's known for its comprehensive plans like the Master Plan and Concept Plan that guide Singapore’s physical development in the long term.

The Ministry of Employment and the Economy of Finland is dedicated to creating conditions favorable for employment, business, and innovation. nodes.label: Confartigianato
nodes.participated: 《欧洲政策中的设计：设计政策问题》|《欧洲设计政策》
nodes.description:
Confartigianato是一个意大利的工艺和小企业协会。它是一个独立的非营利性组织，代表着意大利的小企业、手工业者和工匠。Confartigianato致力于维护和促进这些领域的利益，以及提供支持和服务，以帮助它们在市场上取得成功。

该协会的任务包括为小企业争取更有利的法律和经济环境，提供培训和咨询，推动技术创新，以及促进小企业的国内和国际竞争力。它还在政策制定方面发挥作用，以确保小企业的声音被听到，并影响相关政策的制定。

总之，Confartigianato是一个致力于支持和代表意大利小企业、手工业者和工匠的协会，旨在帮助他们在竞争激烈的商业环境中取得成功。

nodes.participated: 《欧洲政策中的设计：设计政策问题》|《欧洲设计政策》
nodes.description: Munktell Science Park operates mainly within the southwest region of Stockholm, Sweden. It has a strong relationship with MDH of which it is a spinoff. The park is an innovation arena with about 90 tenant companies and about 200 employees focusing on innovative SMEs and on business development assistance.Munktell Science Park作为一个科技园区，有可能由多个合作伙伴组成，包括政府部门、研究机构、大学和私营企业等，共同运营和管理该园区。

nodes.participated: 《欧洲政策中的设计：设计政策问题》|《欧洲设计政策》
nodes.description:
马拉达伦大学位于瑞典，是一所应用科学大学，提供多种本科和研究生课程。该大学强调实践和理论的结合，通过与工业界的合作为学生提供现实世界中的学习机会。马拉达伦大学致力于通过教育和研究推动技术和社会发展，培养学生的实际解决问题的能力

Located in Sweden, Malardalen University is a university of applied sciences offering a wide range of undergraduate and graduate programmes. The university emphasises the integration of practice and theory, providing students with real-world learning opportunities through collaboration with industry. Mälardalen University is committed to advancing technology and society through education and research, and to developing students' practical problem-solving skills.
nodes.abstract:
新加坡国立大学（NUS）是亚洲领先的全球大学之一，以其卓越的教育和研究而闻名。自其成立以来，NUS一直致力于培养未来的领导者和创新者。该大学提供广泛的学科，包括工程、医学和社会科学，以满足全球的挑战。NUS不仅是学术研究的中心，还与企业和政府机构合作，推动社会和经济创新。

The National University of Singapore (NUS) is one of Asia's leading global universities, renowned for its excellence in education and research. Since its inception, NUS has been dedicated to nurturing future leaders and innovators. The university offers a broad range of disciplines, from engineering and medicine to social sciences, addressing global challenges. NUS is not just a hub for academic research but also collaborates with businesses and governmental agencies to drive social and economic innovations.

nodes.label: 南非设计协会Design Institute South Africa
nodes.issued: 《设计中的女性-代表ICSID和 Icograda进行的探索性调查》|《IDA世界设计调查试点项目：南非调查结果》
nodes.description:
南非设计协会致力于在南非推广和发展设计行业。该协会为设计师、学生和企业提供培训、资源和网络机会，以确保南非的设计行业保持其创新性和国际竞争力。

The Design Institute South Africa is dedicated to promoting and developing the design industry in South Africa. The institute provides training, resources, and networking opportunities for designers, students, and businesses to ensure that the South African design industry maintains its innovativeness and international competitiveness.

nodes.label: 爱尔兰工业与雇主联合会Irish Business and Employers Confederation(IBEC)
nodes.label_short: 爱尔兰工业与雇主联合会
nodes.participated: 《爱尔兰国家设计政策》|《创造力、设计和创新技能》
nodes.description:
爱尔兰工业与雇主联合会（Irish Business and Employers Confederation, IBEC）是爱尔兰最大的商业和雇主代表团体，成立于1993年，通过合并爱尔兰雇主联合会和爱尔兰工业联合会而成。IBEC的宗旨是通过影响政策、支持商业成功来促进可持续发展的未来。该组织代表各行各业的爱尔兰企业，在国内外进行政策游说，旨在塑造有利于经济增长的商业环境。此外，IBEC还提供各种专业服务，包括人力资源管理、职业健康安全、员工关系和劳动法等方面的培训和咨询服务。

The Irish Business and Employers Confederation (IBEC) is Ireland's largest representative body of business and employers, formed in 1993 through the merger of the Employers' Confederation of Ireland and the Confederation of Irish Industry.IBEC's purpose is to promote a sustainable future by influencing policy and supporting business success. sustainable future. The organisation represents Irish businesses across a wide range of sectors and lobbies for policy at home and abroad with the aim of shaping a business environment that is conducive to economic growth. In addition, IBEC provides a wide range of professional services, including training and consultancy services in human resource management, occupational health and safety, employee relations and labour law.

nodes.label: 开放政府伙伴关系Open Government Partnership(OGP)
nodes.issued: 《独立报告机制：韩国设计报告2018-2020》
nodes.participated: 《独立报告机制：丹麦设计发展报告2019-2021》|《独立报告机制：韩国设计报告2018-2020》
nodes.category: 政府部门及区域性政府间组织
nodes.description:
开放政府伙伴关系（OGP）是一个多边倡议，旨在确保政府更加开放、透明和负责任。通过这一伙伴关系，参与国家承诺采取行动，增强其政府的透明度、提高公众参与和打击腐败。

The Open Government Partnership (OGP) is a multilateral initiative aimed at ensuring governments are more open, transparent, and accountable. Through this partnership, participating nations commit to taking actions that increase the transparency of their governments, enhance public participation, and combat corruption.

nodes.label: 印度国家设计学院National Institute of Design(NID)
nodes.issued: 《艾哈迈达巴德宣言》|《印度报告》
nodes.description:
印度国家设计学院（NID）是印度最著名的设计学校之一，位于艾哈迈达巴德。自1961年成立以来，NID为印度和国际设计界培养了大量的专业人才。该学院提供从本科到博士的各种设计课程，并与业界进行紧密合作，确保其教育与行业的最新趋势和技术相匹配。

The National Institute of Design (NID) in Ahmedabad stands as one of India's most prestigious design schools. Since its inception in 1961, NID has nurtured a multitude of professional talents for both the Indian and international design landscapes. The institution offers a spectrum of design programs ranging from undergraduate to doctoral levels and maintains close ties with the industry to ensure its education remains aligned with the latest trends and technologies.

nodes.label: 创意广告与设计学院The Institute of Creative Advertising and Design(ICAD)
nodes.participated: 《国家设计战略咨询文件》|《爱尔兰国家设计政策》
nodes.description:
创意广告与设计学院（The Institute of Creative Advertising and Design, ICAD）是一个致力于推广创意广告和设计优秀实践的爱尔兰组织。该学院通过各种奖项、活动和教育计划，提高行业标准，支持和庆祝创意领域的专业人士和新兴才能。ICAD鼓励创新和卓越，旨在通过教育和认可提升行业整体水平。

The Institute of Creative Advertising and Design (ICAD) is an Irish organisation dedicated to promoting excellence in creative advertising and design. The Institute raises industry standards, supports and celebrates professionals and emerging talent in the creative sector through awards, events and educational programmes.ICAD encourages innovation and excellence and aims to enhance the industry as a whole through education and recognition.

nodes.label: 爱尔兰视觉特效协会VFX Ireland
nodes.participated: 《国家设计战略咨询文件》|《爱尔兰国家设计政策》
nodes.description:
爱尔兰视觉特效协会（VFX Ireland）是一个专业组织，代表爱尔兰视觉特效行业的利益。该协会致力于推广视觉特效作为一个创新和技术驱动领域的职业选择，支持行业人才发展，提供培训资源，并为行业从业者提供一个交流和协作的平台。

VFX Ireland is a professional organisation representing the interests of the visual effects industry in Ireland. The Association is committed to promoting visual effects as a career option in an innovative and technologically driven field, supporting the development of talent in the industry, providing training resources and offering a platform for communication and collaboration between industry practitioners.

nodes.label: 爱尔兰建筑师皇家学会Royal Institute of the Architects of Ireland (RIAI)
nodes.label_short: 爱尔兰建筑师皇家学会
nodes.participated: 《国家设计战略咨询文件》|《爱尔兰国家设计政策》
nodes.description:
爱尔兰皇家建筑师学会成立于 1839 年，是 “爱尔兰共和国建筑师的主管部门和建筑专业机构”，其宗旨是 “维护建筑的最高标准，并就影响建筑师、建筑环境和社会的问题提供公正、权威的建议和信息”。RIAI 的主要职责包括 该协会由 26 名成员组成的理事会管理。
The Royal Institute of the Architects of Ireland founded in 1839,is the "competent authority for architects and professional body for Architecture in the Republic of Ireland."The RIAI's purpose is "to uphold the highest standards in architecture and to provide impartial and authoritative advice and information in issues affecting architects, the built environment and society." The RIAI's primary roles are in the areas of: Protecting the consumer; Promoting architecture; Supporting architects and architectural technologists; and Regulating architects.The institute is governed by a 26-member council.

nodes.label: 爱尔兰动画协会Animation Ireland
nodes.participated: 《国家设计战略咨询文件》|《爱尔兰国家设计政策》
nodes.description:
爱尔兰动画协会是爱尔兰主要动画工作室的代表贸易协会。它致力于在全球范围内推广爱尔兰动画，强调爱尔兰因其优惠的税收减免政策和充满活力的创意文化而成为动画制作的首选之地。该协会为各获奖工作室的 2000 多名全职员工提供支持。爱尔兰动画协会还负责管理 “国家动画人才学院 ”等举措，并举办活动进一步发展该行业。

Animation Ireland is the representative trade association for Ireland's leading animation studios. It focuses on promoting Irish animation globally, highlighting Ireland as a prime location for animation production due to favorable tax credits and a vibrant creative culture. The association supports over 2,000 full-time employees across various award-winning studios. Animation Ireland also manages initiatives like The National Talent Academy for Animation and hosts events to further develop the sector

nodes.label: 爱尔兰国立艺术与设计学院National College of Art and Design (NCAD)
nodes.label_short: 爱尔兰国立艺术与设计学院
nodes.participated: 《国家设计战略咨询文件》|《爱尔兰国家设计政策》
nodes.description:
爱尔兰国立艺术与设计学院（NCAD）是爱尔兰的一所领先的艺术和设计学院，为学生提供各种本科和研究生课程。学院鼓励学生发挥创意，探索他们的艺术和设计潜能。NCAD与国内外的工业界、艺术界和设计界建立了紧密的联系，为学生提供实践经验和就业机会。此外，学院还定期组织展览和活动，展示学生和教职员工的作品，进一步加强与社区的联系。

The National College of Art and Design (NCAD) in Ireland is a leading institution for art and design, offering a variety of undergraduate and postgraduate courses. The college encourages students to be creative and explore their artistic and design potentials. NCAD has strong ties with the industrial, artistic, and design sectors both domestically and internationally, providing practical experience and employment opportunities for students. Furthermore, the college regularly organizes exhibitions and events showcasing the work of students and faculty, further strengthening its ties with the community.

nodes.label: 都柏林市地方企业办公室Local Enterprise Office Dublin City(LEO)
nodes.label_short: 都柏林市地方企业办公室
nodes.participated: 《国家设计战略咨询文件》|《爱尔兰国家设计政策》
nodes.description:
都柏林市地方企业办公室 (LEO) 是都柏林市的一个关键机构，旨在支持、指导和促进当地的中小企业发展。LEO为都柏林的创业者和中小企业提供一系列的服务，包括资金支持、培训、咨询和网络活动。该办公室致力于创造一个有利于创新和企业家精神的环境，使都柏林继续成为一个充满活力和成功的商业中心。

The Local Enterprise Office Dublin City (LEO) is a pivotal agency in Dublin City aimed at supporting, guiding, and promoting the development of local SMEs. LEO provides a range of services to entrepreneurs and SMEs in Dublin, including financial support, training, consultancy, and networking events. The office is dedicated to creating an environment conducive to innovation and entrepreneurial spirit, ensuring Dublin continues to be a vibrant and successful business hub.

nodes.label: 爱尔兰时装设计师委员会Council of Irish Fashion Designers(CIFD)
nodes.label_short: 爱尔兰时装设计师委员会
nodes.participated: 《国家设计战略咨询文件》|《爱尔兰国家设计政策》
nodes.description:
爱尔兰时装设计师理事会是一个宣传和业务发展组织，为从事配饰、时装、珠宝和制帽类工作的爱尔兰专业设计师提供支持。
The Council of Irish Fashion Designers is an advocacy and business development organisation supporting professional Irish designers working in the accessories, fashion, jewellery and millinery categories.
nodes.abstract: The Council of Irish Fashion Designers is an advocacy and business development organisation supporting professional Irish designers working in the accessories, fashion, jewellery and millinery categories.

nodes.label: 都柏林市议会Dublin City Council
nodes.participated: 《国家设计战略咨询文件》|《爱尔兰国家设计政策》
nodes.category: 政府部门及区域性政府间组织
nodes.description:
都柏林市政府是都柏林市的地方政府机构，提供从城市规划、道路维护到社会住房和文化发展等一系列市政服务。它在塑造城市环境和提高居民生活质量方面发挥着至关重要的作用。

Dublin City Council is the local government authority for Dublin City and provides a range of municipal services from urban planning and road maintenance to social housing and cultural development. It plays a crucial role in shaping the urban environment and improving the quality of life for its residents.

nodes.label: 邓洛赫尔艺术、设计与技术学院Dún Laoghaire Institute of Art, Design and Technology(IADT)
nodes.label_short: 邓洛赫尔艺术、设计与技术学院
nodes.participated: 《国家设计战略咨询文件》|《爱尔兰国家设计政策》
nodes.description:
邓莱里艺术、设计与技术学院（IADT）以注重创意艺术和数字技术而闻名。它提供一系列艺术、设计、商业和技术课程，营造了一个鼓励创新和实践学习的环境。IADT 致力于为学生提供掌握数字时代必要技能的教育。

Dún Laoghaire Institute of Art, Design and Technology (IADT) is known for its focus on creative arts and digital technologies. It offers a range of programs in art, design, business, and technology, fostering an environment that encourages innovation and practical learning. IADT is committed to providing education that equips students with necessary skills for the digital age.

nodes.description:
欧洲设计协会局Bureau of European Design Associations (BEDA)
欧洲设计协会局（BEDA）是一个代表欧洲各国设计组织的机构。自1969年成立以来，BEDA已致力于加强欧洲各国之间的设计合作，提高设计在经济和社会中的地位，以及为会员提供一个分享经验和最佳实践的平台。

The Bureau of European Design Associations (BEDA) is an entity representing design organizations from across Europe. Since its inception in 1969, BEDA has been dedicated to strengthening design collaboration amongst European nations, elevating the status of design in the economy and society, and offering members a platform to share experiences and best practices.

nodes.label: 南部非洲发展共同体Southern African Development Community(SADC)
nodes.issued: 《南部非洲发展共同体工业化战略和路线图2015-2023》|《南部非洲发展共同体工业化战略和路线图行动计划》
nodes.category: 政府部门及区域性政府间组织
nodes.description:
南部非洲发展共同体（Southern African Development Community，简称SADC）是一个区域经济共同体，旨在促进南部非洲地区的经济合作与整合。成立于1992年，SADC的宗旨是通过合作和区域整合来实现经济发展、减少贫困、增强社区的生活水平和生命质量，并促进和维护地区的和平与安全。
SADC成员国包括安哥拉、博茨瓦纳、科摩罗、刚果（金）、埃斯瓦蒂尼、莱索托、马达加斯加、马拉维、毛里求斯、莫桑比克、纳米比亚、塞舌尔、南非、坦桑尼亚、赞比亚和津巴布韦。该组织致力于促进区域内的贸易和投资、基础设施发展、食品安全和其他领域的合作。

The Southern African Development Community (SADC) is a regional economic community aimed at promoting economic cooperation and integration in the southern African region. Established in 1992, the mission of SADC is to promote economic development, reduce poverty, enhance the living standards and quality of life of the people in the community, and promote and maintain peace and security in the region.
Member states of SADC include Angola, Botswana, Comoros, DR Congo, Eswatini, Lesotho, Madagascar, Malawi, Mauritius, Mozambique, Namibia, Seychelles, South Africa, Tanzania, Zambia, and Zimbabwe. The organization is dedicated to fostering trade and investment, infrastructure development, food security, and cooperation in various other sectors within the region.

nodes.participated: 《设计经济：人物、地点和经济价值》

nodes.description:
英国文化、媒体与体育部（DCMS）是英国政府的一个部门，负责文化、媒体、体育和数字政策的制定和实施。其宗旨是通过支持艺术、文化、体育和数字创新，推动经济增长和社会福祉。此外，DCMS还负责管理和资助一系列与其政策领域相关的机构和项目，包括博物馆、图书馆、历史遗址和广播机构。

The Department for Culture, Media and Sport (DCMS) is a department of the UK government responsible for the formulation and implementation of policies related to culture, media, sports, and digital. Its mission is to drive economic growth and social welfare by supporting arts, culture, sports, and digital innovations. In addition, the DCMS manages and funds a range of institutions and projects related to its policy areas, including museums, libraries, historical sites, and broadcasting entities.

nodes.label: 英国工商联合会Confederation of British Industry(CBI)
nodes.participated: 《设计经济：人物、地点和经济价值》
nodes.description:
英国工业联合会（CBI）是英国的一个商业利益团体，自称代表着 190,000 家企业。[1] 英国工业联合会被《金融时报》称为 “英国最大的商业游说团体”。[2] 根据皇家宪章成立，[3] 其使命是促进英国各种规模和行业的企业能够在有利条件下竞争和繁荣，从而造福所有人。2023 年，该协会因多次被指控组织内存在不当性行为而受到震动。
The Confederation of British Industry (CBI) is a British business interest group, which says it represents 190,000 businesses.[1] The CBI has been described by the Financial Times as "Britain's biggest business lobby group".[2] Incorporated by royal charter,[3] its mission is to promote the conditions in which businesses of all sizes and sectors in the UK can compete and prosper for the benefit of all. In 2023, the association was shaken by numerous accusations of sexual misconduct in the organisation.

nodes.description:
设计博物馆（Design Museum）位于伦敦，是一个开创性的中心，致力于各种形式的当代设计，包括产品设计、工业设计、平面设计、时尚设计和建筑设计。该博物馆由特伦斯-康兰爵士（Sir Terence Conran）创建于 1989 年，2016 年迁至肯辛顿的新址。该博物馆已被公认为该领域的领导者，并于 2018 年获得欧洲年度博物馆奖。

Located in London, the Design Museum is a pioneering hub dedicated to contemporary design in all its forms, including product, industrial, graphic, fashion, and architectural design. Established in 1989 by Sir Terence Conran, it moved to a new location in Kensington in 2016. The museum has been recognized as a leader in the field, receiving the European Museum of the Year Award in 2018​.

nodes.participated: 《设计经济：人物、地点和经济价值》
nodes.description: Girl Up Manchester, whose Founder and President Anita is currently in Year 12 at Crompton House, is a branch group of Girl Up, an organisation that was founded by the UN with the mission to empower girls across Manchester and the world to become the next generation of leaders. This is vital work because only 6 countries currently give women equal legal work rights to men, and it will take an estimated 202 years for women to achieve economic equality.

The DBA champions the role of effective design in the creation of business growth. It is known for promoting professional excellence and ethical practices in the design industry, providing a community where design consultancies and businesses can exchange ideas and drive best practices.

nodes.label: Policy Connect
nodes.participated: 《设计经济：人物、地点和经济价值》
nodes.description:
Policy Connect是英国的一个独立非营利组织，致力于推动更好的政策决策。通过其研究、活动和倡导工作，该组织与议员、学者和行业合作，确保政策制定是基于证据和研究的。Policy Connect覆盖的领域广泛，从教育和健康到环境和经济。他们相信，通过跨部门的合作和对话，可以制定出更有效、更公正的政策。

Policy Connect is an independent, non-profit organization in the UK dedicated to driving better policy decisions. Through its research, events, and advocacy efforts, the organization collaborates with parliamentarians, academics, and industries to ensure policy-making is evidence-based and researched. Policy Connect covers a broad range of areas from education and health to the environment and the economy. They believe that through cross-sectoral collaboration and dialogue, more effective and equitable policies can be formulated.

nodes.description:
BOP Consulting是一个国际咨询公司，专门从事文化和创意产业的研究、策略和评估。成立于1990年，该公司提供数据驱动的解决方案，帮助客户了解和优化他们在文化和创意领域的业务。BOP的专家团队与公共、私营和非营利组织合作，确保文化和创意产业的可持续发展和繁荣。

BOP Consulting is an international consulting firm specializing in research, strategy, and evaluation in the cultural and creative industries. Established in 1990, the firm offers data-driven solutions that help clients understand and optimize their operations in the cultural and creative sectors. BOP's team of experts collaborates with public, private, and non-profit organizations to ensure the sustainable development and prosperity of the cultural and creative industries.

nodes.participated: 《设计经济：人物、地点和经济价值》
nodes.description:
这是苏格兰第一座设计博物馆，也是维多利亚与艾尔伯特博物馆的分馆。它展示了苏格兰的创造力和世界各地最优秀的设计。博物馆位于邓迪，由著名建筑师隈研吾设计，具有独特的建筑风格。。

This is Scotland's first design museum and a branch of the Victoria and Albert Museum. It showcases the brilliance of Scottish creativity and the best of design from around the world. The museum is located in Dundee and features a distinctive architectural style designed by renowned architect Kengo Kuma.

The Local Government Association (LGA) in the UK provides advocacy and advisory services to local governments to help them serve their constituencies more effectively. It focuses on policy, support, and sharing best practices across councils to improve local governance.

nodes.label_short: 英国研究与创新委员会经济与社会研究委员会
nodes.participated: 《设计经济：设计对英国的价值》
nodes.description: The Economic and Social Research Council (ESRC), formerly the Social Science Research Council (SSRC), is part of UK Research and Innovation (UKRI). UKRI is a non-departmental public body (NDPB) funded by the UK government. ESRC provides funding and support for research and training in the social sciences. It is the UK's largest organisation for funding research on economic and social issues.

D&AD is a British educational charity that promotes excellence in design and advertising. It is best known for its annual D&AD Awards, which honor outstanding creativity, originality, technical excellence, and innovation in design and advertising.

nodes.participated: 《设计经济：设计对英国的价值》
nodes.description:
伦敦艺术大学（UAL）是伦敦一所著名的学院式大学，主修艺术、设计、时尚和表演艺术。它由包括中央圣马丁学院和伦敦时装学院在内的六所学院组成，因其对创意产业的影响力而闻名全球。UAL 在艺术和设计领域的高排名得到了广泛认可，培养了来自多个国家的 19,000 多名学生，形成了一个充满活力的社区。
UAL is a prominent collegiate university in London specializing in art, design, fashion, and the performing arts. It comprises six colleges including Central Saint Martins and the London College of Fashion, known globally for their influential contributions to the creative industries. UAL is recognized for its high rankings in art and design, fostering a vibrant community of over 19,000 students from numerous countries.

nodes.participated: 《设计经济：设计对英国的价值》
nodes.category: 政府部门及区域性政府间组织
nodes.description:
英国企业、创新与技能部（BIS）负责制定和执行英国政府的商业、创新和高等教育政策。该部门的目标是使英国成为最好的地方创业、创新和学习，支持企业增长，推进创新，以及确保高等教育为社会和经济做出贡献。

The Department for Business, Innovation and Skills (BIS) was responsible for formulating and executing the UK government's business, innovation, and higher education policies. Its aim was to make the UK the best place to start and grow a business, to foster innovation, and to ensure that higher education contributes to the society and the economy.

nodes.label: 工程与物理科学研究委员会Engineering and Physical Sciences Research Council (EPSRC)
nodes.label_short: 工程与物理科学研究委员会
nodes.participated: 《设计经济：设计对英国的价值》
nodes.description: The Engineering and Physical Sciences Research Council (EPSRC) is a British Research Council that provides government funding for grants to undertake research and postgraduate degrees in engineering and the physical sciences, mainly to universities in the United Kingdom. EPSRC research areas include mathematics, physics, chemistry, artificial intelligence and computer science, but exclude particle physics, nuclear physics, space science and astronomy (which fall under the remit of the Science and Technology Facilities Council). Since 2018 it has been part of UK Research and Innovation, which is funded through the Department for Business, Energy and Industrial Strategy.

The University of Huddersfield is a public university located in Huddersfield, West Yorkshire, England. It offers a broad range of undergraduate and postgraduate courses and is known for its extensive research and innovation contributions, along with a strong emphasis on professional employment for graduates.

nodes.label: Creative & Cultural Skills
nodes.description:
Creative & Cultural Skills是一个英国的非营利组织，致力于为创意和文化产业的员工提供专业技能培训和发展机会。这个组织认识到，为确保创意产业的长远发展，需要不断地为员工提供新的学习和发展机会。因此，它与多家企业、教育机构和政府部门合作，提供各种培训课程、研讨会和工作坊，帮助员工提升自己的职业技能和知识。

Creative & Cultural Skills is a non-profit organization in the UK dedicated to providing professional skills training and development opportunities for staff in the creative and cultural industries. The organization recognizes the need for continuous learning and development opportunities for staff to ensure the long-term development of the creative industry. Therefore, it collaborates with various businesses, educational institutions, and government departments to offer a range of training courses, seminars, and workshops, helping employees enhance their professional skills and knowledge.

nodes.label: New Local Government Network
nodes.description:
New Local Government Network (NLGN) 是一个独立的智库，致力于为英国的地方政府提供创新的思考和政策建议。NLGN与各级政府、企业和公民社区紧密合作，探索和推广新的治理模式，以更有效地应对当今社会的挑战。该组织相信，地方政府在塑造其社区的未来方面拥有独特的力量和机会，并应该在决策过程中更加地参与和领导。

The New Local Government Network (NLGN) is an independent think tank dedicated to fostering innovative thinking and policy recommendations for the UK's local governments. Working closely with governments at all levels, businesses, and civic communities, NLGN explores and champions new governance models to address contemporary societal challenges more effectively. The organization believes that local governments possess a unique power and opportunity in shaping the future of their communities and should be more involved and lead in the decision-making process.

The House of Lords is the upper house of the Parliament of the United Kingdom. It plays a critical role in examining and revising proposed legislation, providing a depth of expertise and serving as a check on the legislative process initiated in the House of Commons.

nodes.label: 首尔国立大学名誉教授,韩国未来设计研究院院长Soonjong Lee
nodes.label_short: 首尔国立大学名誉教授,韩国未来设计研究院院长
nodes.issued: 《设计问题报告：国家未来社会设计政策方向》
nodes.description:
Soonjong Lee教授是首尔国立大学的名誉教授，同时也是韩国未来设计研究院的院长。他在设计、创新和研究领域有着丰富的经验和深入的见解。Lee教授为韩国设计做出了巨大的贡献，并通过其领导和研究推动了设计教育和实践的进步。

Professor Soonjong Lee is an emeritus professor at Seoul National University and also serves as the head of the Korea Future Design Research Institute. He boasts extensive experience and profound insights into design, innovation, and research realms. Professor Lee has made significant contributions to the design in Korea and has fostered the advancement of design education and practice through his leadership and research.

nodes.label: 莫纳什大学Monash University
nodes.participated: 《设计我们的未来：维多利亚州高等设计教育报告》
nodes.description:
莫纳什大学是澳大利亚的一所公立研究型大学，成立于1958年，是澳大利亚八大名校之一。它在多个学科领域均享有国际声誉，尤其在工程学、医学和艺术方面。大学设有多个校区，分布在澳大利亚和海外，拥有大量国际学生。莫纳什大学致力于创新研究、高质量的教学和对社会的积极影响。

Monash University is a public research university in Australia, established in 1958 and is one of the Group of Eight leading universities in Australia. It holds international repute across various disciplines, particularly in engineering, medicine, and arts. The university has multiple campuses located in Australia and overseas, accommodating a significant international student population. Monash is committed to innovative research, high-quality teaching, and making a positive impact on society.

nodes.label: 维多利亚州雇主商会与工业协会Victorian Employers' Chamber of Commerce and Industry(VECCI)

nodes.participated: 《设计我们的未来：维多利亚州高等设计教育报告》
nodes.description:
维多利亚州雇主商会与工业协会（VECCI）是澳大利亚维多利亚州最大的雇主组织，为会员提供商业建议、培训和其他支持服务。这个组织致力于支持和代表维多利亚州的商业和工业，确保其在政策和经济问题上的声音得到听取。VECCI与政府、工会和其他利益相关者建立了广泛的联系，为其会员提供最新的信息和建议。

The Victorian Employers' Chamber of Commerce and Industry (VECCI) is the largest employer organization in the state of Victoria, Australia, offering business advice, training, and other support services to its members. The organization is dedicated to supporting and representing the business and industrial community of Victoria, ensuring its voice is heard on policy and economic issues. VECCI maintains extensive connections with the government, unions, and other stakeholders to provide its members with up-to-date information and advice.

nodes.label: Wallis Consulting Group
nodes.participated: 《设计我们的未来：维多利亚州高等设计教育报告》
nodes.description:
Wallis Consulting Group 是一家位于澳大利亚的研究公司，拥有超过25年的市场和社会研究经验。作为行业的领军者，Wallis Consulting Group 提供一系列的研究服务，从定量研究到定性研究，为公、私部门的客户提供关键的洞察。其专家团队采用最先进的研究方法和工具，确保提供准确和及时的数据给客户。该集团的成功建立在其对于研究的热情和对客户的承诺之上，这使其能够为各种行业的客户提供深入的见解和有针对性的建议，帮助他们更好地了解市场和客户需求。

Wallis Consulting Group is an Australian-based research firm with over 25 years of experience in market and social research. A leader in the industry, Wallis Consulting Group offers a range of research services, from quantitative to qualitative studies, providing key insights for both public and private sector clients. Its team of experts employs cutting-edge research methods and tools, ensuring accurate and timely data delivery to clients. The group's success is built on its passion for research and commitment to its clients, allowing it to offer deep insights and tailored recommendations to clients across various sectors, helping them to better understand the market and customer needs.

nodes.label: Nesta
nodes.description:
Nesta是一家总部位于英国的全球创新基金会，致力于寻找、开展并促进创新解决方案来应对当今世界所面临的重要挑战。从健康和教育到社会公正和可持续性，Nesta通过研究、投资和实践活动，为各种问题提供创新的方法。Nesta相信创新有助于创造更好、更公正的未来，并与政府、社区和企业合作，将创新理念转化为现实。

Nesta is a global innovation foundation headquartered in the UK, dedicated to finding, developing, and promoting innovative solutions to address the significant challenges of today's world. From health and education to social justice and sustainability, Nesta provides innovative approaches to various problems through research, investment, and practical activities. Nesta believes that innovation can help create a better, more equitable future and collaborates with governments, communities, and businesses to turn innovative ideas into reality.

卢森堡创新署（Luxinnovation）是卢森堡促进创新和研究的国家机构。它支持企业和研究计划，促进国际合作，并提供创新实践和资金方面的指导
Luxinnovation is Luxembourg's national agency for promoting innovation and research. It supports business and research initiatives, facilitating international partnerships and providing guidance on innovation practices and funding.
nodes.abstract:
新加坡国立大学（NUS）是亚洲领先的全球大学之一，以其卓越的教育和研究而闻名。自其成立以来，NUS一直致力于培养未来的领导者和创新者。该大学提供广泛的学科，包括工程、医学和社会科学，以满足全球的挑战。NUS不仅是学术研究的中心，还与企业和政府机构合作，推动社会和经济创新。

The National University of Singapore (NUS) is one of Asia's leading global universities, renowned for its excellence in education and research. Since its inception, NUS has been dedicated to nurturing future leaders and innovators. The university offers a broad range of disciplines, from engineering and medicine to social sciences, addressing global challenges. NUS is not just a hub for academic research but also collaborates with businesses and governmental agencies to drive social and economic innovations.

nodes.label: 英国贸易工业部Department of Trade and Industry,England
nodes.issued: 15号文件《创意、设计和商业表现》
nodes.category: 政府部门及区域性政府间组织
nodes.description:
英国贸易工业部Department of Trade and Industry,England 是英国政府的一个部门，主要负责制定和执行国家的工业、贸易和能源政策。它的目标是促进英国的经济增长和国际竞争力。
The Department of Trade and Industry in England is a department of the UK government responsible for formulating and executing the nation's industrial, trade, and energy policies. Its aim is to promote the economic growth and international competitiveness of the UK.

nodes.label: 伦敦大学University of London
nodes.participated: 15号文件《创意、设计和商业表现》
nodes.description:
伦敦大学于 1836 年根据皇家特许状成立，是一所由 17 所独立成员院校组成的联邦制大学。该校以课程种类繁多、注重远程和灵活学习机会而著称，面向全球学生。该大学因其成员院校对学术和专业领域的重大贡献而得到认可，其中包括伦敦大学学院和伦敦国王学院等备受推崇的学院。

The University of London, established by royal charter in 1836, is a federal university comprising 17 independent member institutions. It's known for a diverse range of programs and a strong focus on distance and flexible learning opportunities, catering to a global student body. The university is recognized for its significant contribution to the academic and professional fields through its member institutions, which include highly respected colleges such as UCL and King's College London.

nodes.label: 曼彻斯特大学University of Manchester
nodes.participated: 15号文件《创意、设计和商业表现》
nodes.description:
曼彻斯特大学以其研究成果而闻名，以科学和工程以及人文和商业为重点。曼彻斯特大学是著名的英国研究密集型大学罗素集团的成员之一，提供广泛的本科和研究生课程。

The University of Manchester is renowned for its research output and has a strong emphasis on science and engineering, along with humanities and business. It is part of the prestigious Russell Group of research-intensive British universities and offers a wide range of undergraduate and postgraduate programs.

nodes.participated: 15号文件《创意、设计和商业表现》
nodes.description:
伦敦帝国理工学院是一所世界领先的理工、医学和商科院校。帝国理工学院以其高学术标准和全球研究影响力而闻名，一直名列全球顶尖大学之列。

Imperial College London is a world-leading institution that specializes in science, engineering, medicine, and business. Known for its high academic standards and global research impact, Imperial is consistently ranked among the top universities worldwide.

nodes.label: 英国财政部Department for HM Treasury
nodes.participated: 15号文件《创意、设计和商业表现》
nodes.category: 政府部门及区域性政府间组织
nodes.description:
财政部是英国政府的经济和财政部门，负责制定和执行公共财政和经济政策。该部门的职责包括监督公共开支，努力实现稳定和增长等经济目标，以及征收税款。

The HM Treasury is the United Kingdom's government's economic and finance ministry, responsible for developing and executing public finance and economic policy. The department's role includes overseeing public spending, working towards economic goals such as stability and growth, and collecting taxes.

nodes.label: 诺丁汉大学商学院Nottingham University Business School
nodes.participated: 15号文件《创意、设计和商业表现》
nodes.description:
这所商学院隶属于诺丁汉大学，以其对可持续商业实践和企业责任的高度重视而著称。它提供的各种课程融合了国际商业趋势和新的管理理论。

Part of the University of Nottingham, this business school is noted for its strong emphasis on sustainable business practices and corporate responsibility. It offers a variety of programs that integrate international business trends and new management theories.

nodes.label: the Cox Review team
nodes.participated: 15号文件《创意、设计和商业表现》
nodes.description:
The Cox Review是英国政府委托进行的一项独立审查，旨在探讨如何通过创造力提高英国企业的竞争力。其重点是促进创新以及设计在提高各行业绩效方面的作用

The Cox Review was an independent review commissioned by the UK government to explore how creativity can enhance the competitiveness of UK businesses. It focused on promoting innovation and the role of design in improving performance across sectors.

nodes.label: 曼彻斯特商学院Manchester Business School
nodes.participated: 15号文件《创意、设计和商业表现》
nodes.description:
曼彻斯特商学院是位于英国曼彻斯特的一所顶尖商学院，隶属于曼彻斯特大学。成立于1965年，它是英国最早的两所商学院之一，长期以来一直在全球商学院排名中占有领先地位。学院提供各种商业与管理相关的学位课程，如MBA、DBA、博士和硕士课程。它的教育方法强调实践性和理论的结合，培养学生具有国际化视角和创新能力。学院还与全球多家企业和机构建立了合作关系，为学生提供实习和就业机会。

Manchester Business School is a leading business school located in Manchester, England, and is part of the University of Manchester. Established in 1965, it is one of the two earliest business schools in the UK and has consistently held a prominent place in global business school rankings. The school offers a variety of business and management-related degree programs, such as MBA, DBA, Ph.D., and master's courses. Its educational approach emphasizes the combination of practice and theory, cultivating students with an international perspective and innovative capabilities. The school has also established partnerships with numerous enterprises and institutions worldwide, providing students with internship and employment opportunities.

nodes.label: 新加坡理工学院Singapore Polytechnic
nodes.participated: 《新加坡和韩国，设计作为公共政策的工具》
nodes.description:
新加坡理工学院成立于 1954 年，是新加坡第一所理工学院。它提供工程、商业和设计等不同领域的各种文凭课程。该学院以其全面的技术教育方法而广受好评，其重点是通过培养学生的相关技能来满足新加坡经济不断变化的需求。该校还以其充满活力的校园生活和广泛的设施（包括先进的实验室和体育设施）而闻名。

Established in 1954, Singapore Polytechnic was the first polytechnic in Singapore. It offers a wide range of diploma courses across various fields such as engineering, business, and design. The institution is well-regarded for its comprehensive approach to technical education, focusing on meeting the changing needs of Singapore's economy by equipping students with relevant skills. It's also noted for its vibrant campus life and extensive facilities, including advanced labs and sports facilities.

nodes.label: 加拿大亚太基金会Asia Pacific Foundation of Canada
nodes.issued: 《新加坡和韩国，设计作为公共政策的工具》
nodes.description:
加拿大亚太基金会（APF Canada）是一个非营利组织，旨在促进加拿大与亚洲的关系，作为两地间交流的催化剂。该基金会致力于通过提供高质量、相关和及时的信息、见解和视角，加强加拿大与亚洲的联系。
加拿大亚太基金会运营着多种多样的项目和研究活动，涵盖了商业、战略问题、数字化进步、参与和可持续性等多个主题领域。研究通常包括定期报告、政策简报、案例研究、分派和数字媒体贡献，涵盖了中国、东南亚、东北亚和南亚等广泛的地理焦点。此外，它们深入探讨了国际贸易和投资以及教育等跨领域主题，旨在提高加拿大人，特别是年轻加拿大人对亚洲的认识和理解。
该基金会主要由加拿大政府的捐款、企业和个人捐赠者支持，并由董事会管理。加拿大亚太基金会遵循1985年修订的亚太基金会法律框架，并向外交事务部长提交年度报告，该报告可以提交给议会。
它的结构包括有经验的执行团队、内部研究人员、杰出研究员和网络合作伙伴，他们为加拿大-亚洲关系提供专业知识。他们提供定制的简报、亚洲能力培训，并可在会议或活动中提供演讲。
The Asia Pacific Foundation of Canada (APF Canada) is a not-for-profit entity aiming to foster Canada's relationships with Asia, acting as a catalyst for engagement between the two regions. It strives to strengthen the ties by offering high-quality, pertinent, and timely information, insights, and perspectives on Canada-Asia relations, utilizing tools like the Canada-Asia Sustainability Tracker (CAST) to enhance awareness among Canadian stakeholders regarding the region's development.
APF Canada operates a diverse range of programs and research activities covering various thematic areas, including business, strategic issues, digital advancements, engagement, and sustainability. The research often extends into regular reports, policy briefs, case studies, dispatches, and digital media contributions, which cover a broad spectrum of geographical focuses such as Greater China, Southeast Asia, Northeast Asia, and South Asia. Moreover, they delve into cross-cutting themes like international trade & investment and education, aimed at increasing the awareness and understanding of Asia among Canadians, particularly the youth.
The foundation is supported by an endowment from the Government of Canada, corporate and individual donors, and is governed by a Board of Directors. APF Canada adheres to a legislative framework, outlined in the Asia-Pacific Foundation Act (1985 as amended), and submits an annual report to the Minister of Foreign Affairs, which can be tabled in the Parliament.
Its structure comprises an experienced executive team, in-house research staff, distinguished fellows, and network partners, who offer expertise on Canada-Asia relations. They provide tailored briefings, Asia Competency training, and are available for speaking engagements at conferences or events.

nodes.label: 加拿大设计研究网络The Canadian Design Research Network
nodes.issued: 《新加坡和韩国，设计作为公共政策的工具》
nodes.description:
加拿大设计研究网络（CDRN）是一个致力于提高加拿大设计研究质量和可见度的机构。它连接各种学术、产业和政府利益相关者，以促进跨学科合作、知识共享和设计创新。通过举办研讨会、发布研究报告和提供资金支持，CDRN鼓励加拿大的设计研究和实践。

The Canadian Design Research Network (CDRN) is an organization dedicated to enhancing the quality and visibility of design research in Canada. It connects various academic, industry, and government stakeholders to promote interdisciplinary collaboration, knowledge sharing, and design innovation. Through hosting seminars, publishing research reports, and providing funding support, the CDRN fosters design research and practice in Canada.

The Canadian Design Research Network (CDRN) is an organization dedicated to enhancing the quality and visibility of design research in Canada. It connects various academic, industry, and government stakeholders to promote interdisciplinary collaboration, knowledge sharing, and design innovation. Through hosting seminars, publishing research reports, and providing funding support, the CDRN fosters design research and practice in Canada.

nodes.label: 韩国科学技术院Korea Advanced Institute of Science and Technology(KAIST)
nodes.participated: 《新加坡和韩国，设计作为公共政策的工具》
nodes.description:
KAIST 是韩国一所领先的研究型大学，以其对科学和技术的高度重视而闻名。它提供各种本科和研究生课程，尤其以工程和信息技术方面的创新而闻名。KAIST 致力于培养能够通过尖端研究和创新发展为全球社会做出贡献的精英人才。
KAIST is a leading research-oriented university in South Korea, renowned for its strong emphasis on science and technology. It offers a variety of undergraduate and graduate programs, particularly noted for innovations in engineering and IT. KAIST is committed to fostering elite human resources capable of contributing to the global community through cutting-edge research and innovative developments.

nodes.label: 日本发明协会Japan Institute of Invention and Innovation(JIII)
nodes.description:
日本发明协会Japan Institute of Invention and Innovation(JIII)促进日本全国的技术进步和创新。它通过专利便利化为发明人提供支持，并鼓励新发明的商业化。日本发明创新研究所在日本的创新生态系统中发挥着至关重要的作用，它组织展览，并奖励对工业和技术做出贡献的发明家。

The Japan Institute of Invention and Innovation promotes the advancement of technology and innovation across Japan. It supports inventors through patent facilitation and encourages the commercialization of new inventions. JIII plays a crucial role in Japan’s innovation ecosystem by organizing exhibitions and awarding inventors for their contributions to industry and technology.

nodes.description:
国际设计交流协会致力于促进设计领域的全球合作与交流。它致力于加强对世界各地设计文化的理解和欣赏，促进国际设计活动，并促进设计师之间的专业交流。

The International Design Exchange Association is dedicated to promoting global cooperation and exchange in the field of design. It works towards enhancing the understanding and appreciation of design cultures from around the world, facilitating international design events, and fostering professional exchanges among designers.

nodes.label: 日本国际设计交流协会Japan Design Foundation(JDF)
nodes.label_short: 日本国际设计交流协会
nodes.description:
日本国际设计交流协会（JDF）是一个致力于推动日本设计与国际设计交流的非营利组织。JDF自成立以来一直积极组织各种设计相关的展览、研讨会和工作坊，推动日本与世界各地的设计师和机构进行合作和交流。此外，JDF还致力于研究和传播日本的设计理念和方法，使之更广泛地被国际社会接受和认可。

The Japan Design Foundation (JDF) is a non-profit organization dedicated to promoting the exchange of design between Japan and the international community. Since its inception, JDF has actively organized various design-related exhibitions, seminars, and workshops, promoting collaboration and exchange between Japanese and designers and institutions worldwide. In addition, JDF is committed to researching and disseminating Japanese design philosophies and methodologies, making them more widely accepted and recognized by the international community.

nodes.label: Kone Corporation
nodes.description:
Kone 公司是电梯和自动扶梯行业的全球领先企业，总部位于芬兰。该公司以其创新的解决方案而闻名，使城市环境更加无障碍和可持续发展。Kone 致力于为现代建筑提供高品质的电梯、自动扶梯和先进的解决方案，从而改善城市生活的流程。

Kone Corporation is a global leader in the elevator and escalator industry, headquartered in Finland. The company is known for its innovative solutions in making urban environments more accessible and sustainable. Kone is committed to improving the flow of urban life by providing high-quality elevators, escalators, and advanced solutions for modern buildings.

nodes.label_short: 赫尔辛基国际设计基金会
nodes.description:
赫尔辛基国际设计基金会继承了2012年世界设计之都项目的成就，并推动了为期两年的“设计驱动城市”项目，专注于将设计思维和专业知识整合到公共服务设计中。该基金会通过设计改善城市功能，提升公共服务质量​ (Design Helsinki)。

The International Design Foundation Helsinki built on the success of the World Design Capital 2012 initiative, driving the two-year Design Driven City project which focused on integrating design thinking and expertise into public service design. The foundation works on enhancing city functions and improving the quality of public services through design​ (Design Helsinki).

nodes.label: 芬兰工业联合会Confederation of Finnish Industries (EK)
nodes.description: The Confederation of Finnish Industries (EK) is the largest employers' association in Finland. It was formed at the beginning of 2005 when the two employers' associations Palvelutyönantajat (Employers of the Service Sector) and Teollisuuden ja Työnantajain Keskusliitto (Union of Industries and Employers) merged. EK's member companies collectively contribute over 70% of Finland's GDP, and over 95% of Finland's exports. It has considerable negotiating power, since Finland has universal validity of collective labour agreements, and often a national income policy agreement is reached.

nodes.description:

Grafia is a Finnish professional organization focused on visual communication design, supporting graphic designers, illustrators, and visual content creators. It aims to enhance professional development and the societal impact of designers' work through education, networking, and raising industry standards.

nodes.label: 芬兰经济发展、交通与环境中心The Centres for Economic Development, Transport and the Environment
nodes.label_short: 芬兰经济发展、交通与环境中心
nodes.category: 政府部门及区域性政府间组织
nodes.description:
芬兰的经济发展、交通与环境中心是芬兰政府的地方机构，旨在促进区域发展，确保可持续的交通和环境管理。这些中心通过提供资金、技术支持和政策建议，帮助当地社区和企业实现经济增长、交通效率和环境保护。

The Centres for Economic Development, Transport and the Environment in Finland are regional agencies of the Finnish government aimed at promoting regional development and ensuring sustainable transportation and environmental management. These centers assist local communities and businesses in achieving economic growth, transportation efficiency, and environmental conservation by providing funding, technical support, and policy recommendations.

nodes.label: 芬兰应用科学大学校长联席会议The Rectors’ Conference of Finnish Universities of Applied Sciences Arene
nodes.label_short: 芬兰应用科学大学校长联席会议
nodes.description:
芬兰应用科学大学校长联席会议（Arene）是代表芬兰所有应用科学大学的一个组织。它的主要任务是促进这些大学之间的合作，以及与政府、商界和其他教育机构之间的合作。Arene致力于加强应用研究，推动教育创新，为学生和教育工作者提供更好的机会。

The Rectors’ Conference of Finnish Universities of Applied Sciences, Arene, represents all the universities of applied sciences in Finland. Its main mission is to promote cooperation between these universities, as well as with the government, business sector, and other educational institutions. Arene is committed to strengthening applied research, promoting educational innovation, and providing better opportunities for students and educators.

Sitra, the Finnish Innovation Fund, is a public foundation aimed at fostering stable, sustainable economic growth in Finland through funding and strategy initiatives focused on innovation in various sectors including environment and health

nodes.label: Fjord Helsinki
nodes.description:
Fjord Helsinki是设计和创新咨询公司Fjord的赫尔辛基分公司。Fjord是一家全球性的公司，专注于为客户提供用户体验和服务设计解决方案。在赫尔辛基的这家分公司，团队依靠北欧的设计传统，为客户创建富有创意、富有洞察力和用户中心的设计解决方案。Fjord Helsinki紧密地与各行各业的客户合作，从金融服务到消费技术，都能找到它们的身影。

Fjord Helsinki is the Helsinki branch of the design and innovation consultancy, Fjord. A global entity, Fjord specializes in providing clients with user experience and service design solutions. At its Helsinki branch, the team leverages Nordic design traditions to craft creative, insightful, and user-centric design solutions for clients. Fjord Helsinki works closely with clients from various sectors, from financial services to consumer technology.
